title: GarageBand 10.1.5 – Complete recording studio and more

title: YemuZip 2.5 – Easy-to-use Zip compression utility
content: YemuZip is a simple, no-frills, easy-to-use application for making ZIP files. Unlike the built-in compress function, YemuZip lets you choose between preserving Mac specific metadata and making clean PC-friendly ZIP files. YemuZip also includes convenience like the ability to zip straight into a new email.   Version 2.5: Updated to use new APIs.   Intel, […]
